attributes.action: Ban the Muslim women from wearing black veils all over themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If people wearing hoodies are not allowed to enter shops and banks, then why are muslim women wearing veils?
These women not only look out of place but damn scary, they have scared children on numerous occassions.
England is a country with equal rights to both men and women. The women here dont go covered in black veils in public. If Muslim community does that, let them practice this in their country. If they are citizens of England they should go by the country's rules. 
And why do Muslim men never practice this veil thing?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
